info.title: StatsV2 API
info.description: Financial statistics calculation API supporting multiple asset types and time periods

post.description: Calculate comprehensive financial statistics for multiple assets as of a specific date with lookback periods
Calculate financial statistics for discrete time periods (yearly, quarterly, monthly)
Extract raw financial data (prices, volumes, OHLV, dividends) for multiple assets with date range support

get.description: Extract financial data for a single ticker with query parameter options. If start and end dates are not provided, defaults to 1 year of data ending on the current date.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Start date. If not provided, defaults to 1 year before end date.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: End date. If not provided, defaults to current date.

parameters.name: frequency
parameters.description: Data frequency: daily, weekly (Fridays), monthly (month-end), or quarterly (quarter-end)

StatsV2Request.description: Calculate financial statistics for multiple assets. Supports simple ticker symbols or complex portfolio models including static allocations, dynamic strategies, and momentum-based selection.

assets.description:
List of assets to analyze. Can be:
        - Simple ticker symbols (e.g., "AAPL", "MSFT") 
        - Static portfolio models with fixed allocations
        - Dynamic portfolios that change over time
        - Momentum strategies that rank and select securities
        - Custom price data

to.description: End date (defaults to as_of date if not specified)

name.description: Display name for the portfolio strategy

holdings.description: Portfolio holdings with weights. Weights should sum to 100 (representing percentages).

rebalance.description: How often to rebalance the portfolio to target weights

start.description: Start date for backtesting this model

StaticModel.title: Static Portfolios
StaticModel.description: Fixed allocation portfolio that rebalances to target weights

name.description: Display name for the dynamic strategy

ticker.description: Unique identifier for this dynamic model

start.description: Date when this allocation becomes active

holdings.description: Portfolio allocation for this time period

models.description: Array of portfolio allocations that activate on specific dates. Models are applied chronologically based on start dates.

DynamicModel.description: Portfolio that changes allocation over time
DynamicModel.title: Dynamic Portfolio

name.description: Display name for the momentum strategy

ticker.description: Unique identifier for this momentum model

start.description: Start date for backtesting this momentum strategy

rebalance.description: How often to rerank securities and rebalance the portfolio

universe.description: Pool of securities to select from. The strategy will rank these and hold the top performers.

number_holdings.description: Number of securities to hold from the ranked universe (e.g., '5' holds top 5 performers)

MomentumModel.title: Momentum Strategy
MomentumModel.description: Strategy that ranks securities and holds top performers

correlation_period.description: Number of days for correlation calculations

periods.description: Period-specific statistics keyed by period name

AssetInfo.description: Static security information that doesn't change based on as_of date

StatsV2SharedData.description: Pricing and yield data shared across all periods (snapshot mode only)

current_close_price.description: Current close price (or -1 if calculation error)

previous_close_price.description: Previous close price (or -1 if calculation error)

price_change.description: Price change in currency units (or -1 if calculation error)

price_change_percent.description: Price change as decimal (0.0092 = 0.92%, or -99 if calculation error)

yield_income.description: Income yield as decimal (0.0055 = 0.55%, or -99 if calculation error)

yield_short.description: Short-term yield as decimal (or -99 if calculation error)

yield_long.description: Long-term yield as decimal (or -99 if calculation error)

yield_all.description: Total yield as decimal (or -99 if calculation error)

total.description: Total cumulative return over the full period, unadjusted for time (e.g., 0.25 = 25% return over 3 years).

annualized_market.description: Annualized return adjusted by market days (252.25 / trading_days).

annualized_calendar.description: Annualized return adjusted by calendar days (365.25 / calendar_days).

Risk.description: Comprehensive risk analysis organized by category

downside_deviation.description: Downside deviation focusing only on negative returns

ulcer_index.description: Ulcer Index measuring the depth and duration of drawdowns

MarketRisk.description: Risk metrics relative to benchmark and market exposure

alpha.description: Jensen's alpha measuring excess return vs benchmark

beta.description: Beta coefficient measuring systematic risk relative to benchmark

ftalpha.description: FastTrack Alpha proprietary risk-adjusted performance metric

sharpe_ratio.description: Sharpe ratio measuring excess return per unit of total risk

sortino_ratio.description: Sortino ratio measuring excess return per unit of downside risk

treynor_ratio.description: Treynor ratio measuring excess return per unit of systematic risk

ulcer_performance_index.description: Ulcer Performance Index measuring return per unit of ulcer index

value.description: Maximum drawdown as decimal (-0.152 = -15.2%, or -99 if calculation error)

recovery_days.description: Days to recover from drawdown (-1 if not recovered)

value.description: Moving average value (or -1 if calculation error)

dates.description: Date array corresponding to all time series data points (included when date range is specified)

start_date.description: Actual start date of data range (first date in dates array)

end_date.description: Actual end date of data range (last date in dates array)

dates.description: Date array for time series data (when applicable)

short.description: Short moving average period in days

long.description: Long moving average period in days

lookback_period.description: Lookback period for MA calculations (days as integer or 'month'/'quarter'/'year')
Lookback period for calculations (days as integer or 'month'/'quarter'/'year')

assets.description: List of assets to extract data for. Same format as StatsV2 assets.

include.description: Data types to include in response. See [Asset Type Compatibility](/docs/ftlightning/q1qm3qbjxdfhx-data-api-reference-guide#asset-type-compatibility-asset-type-compatibility) for data availability by asset type.

start_date.description: Start date for time series data. If not provided, defaults to 1 year before the as_of date (or current date if as_of is also not specified).

end_date.description: End date for time series data. If not provided, defaults to the as_of date (or current date if as_of is also not specified).

adjusted.description: Fully adjusted closing prices accounting for splits, dividends, and other corporate actions. This is the default price series used for calculations.

unadjusted.description: Raw closing prices as traded, without any adjustments for splits or dividends. Only available when options.unadjusted = true.

semi_adjusted.description: Prices adjusted for stock splits but not dividends. Only available when options.semi_adjusted = true.

DataFrequency.description: Data frequency that determines which dates are included in the response. See [Data Frequency Guide](/docs/ftlightning/q1qm3qbjxdfhx-data-api-reference-guide#data-frequency-data-frequency) for detailed behavior and examples.
